name: Vivek Shrinivasan
intro: Vivek Shrinivasan is a self taught Design driven Engineer with 6+ years of experience, who spends most of the time in building better experiences for users on the web. His unique skill set, working with designers has been front-end development using javascript. Until recently, when working with Gramener, he worked on story telling using data and data visualisations. Earlier, he worked with Informatica and Symantec along with the UX team in helping build prototypes and evaluating enterprise products. He also works on python as a tool for data analysis and personal projects.

desc: Developed dashboards and visual stories using data. Responsible for leading and developing dashboards with a team of developers.
As a lead, I was responsible for client requirement gathering and designing, prototyping and leading the development.
Worked on d3.js for data visualisation and other libraries like jQuery, lodash, mocha (testing), grunt (task-mannagement) etc.
Worked on pandas - a python library for data analysis and gramex - an internal web server & python platform for dasboards.

Built an internal javascript framework, using bootstrap, jquery and d3js for rapid prototyping as part of the UX team and established a process for prototyping and evaluation of the framework on multiple products like Data Profiling, Data Validation and Business Glossary.
Executing all visual design stages from concept to engineering team.
Conducted user research and evaluation of user feedback on multiple products and successfully integrated the visual design into production.

As part of the UX team, worked closely with UI Engineers across multiple product lines, to integrate and upgrade UI changes, fulfilling the purpose of having a unique visual language across Symantec products.
Built high-fedility prototypes, for user validation processes to apply changes into products.
Worked with multiple front-end technologies across verticals including jQuery-UI and Sencha for mobile UI component patterns.
Worked on buildling web applications using PHP and Wordpress as a content management system.
Designed the UI, built the front-end and deployed wazaap, an event discovery platform based of SF, California, along with one team member
Designed and developed a social networking platform, using buddypress, a plugin for wordpress for ManUtd fans.
Primarly worked with PHP, Wordpress, jQuery and SQL.

certifications.title: edX | MIT - Computer Science and Programming using Python
